message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.GR 

This paper focuses on computer vision tasks related to human sensing, including recognition and reconstruction of human body parts in monocular images. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also proposes a deep multitask architecture, which involves training multiple components simultaneously, suggesting that it may also fall under cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, the use of 3D pose estimation and figure-ground segmentation suggests that it may be relevant to cs.RO (Robotics) and cs.GR (Graphics).
